page.title: 06Life Styles. Headmaster.
page.content:
I arrived at Alf Kaufman School at 8:30 this morning. As usual I opened the mail and dictated any replies. During the day I interviewed a parent whose child is to come here, swam in the pool with Class 4, then supervised a table at dinner. Later I filled in forms and talked to a speech therapist about a child. I got an invitation to be presented with a cheque for school funds.The money came from a sponsered run.In the evening I went to the Curtain Theatre with some fiends to see a play. After the theatre we went to Norden Cricket Club for pie and peas, a drink and to meet some friends. I will be in Norden again tomorrow when my nephew gets married at Norden Parish Church.
Robert B. Sturgess. July 1985.
